text: Lee Soon-jae (; born November 16, 1934) is a South Korean actor. His career began in 1956. He was honored with the Eungwan Order of Cultural Merit for his work as an actor. In recent years, he appeared in the television series Grandpas Over Flowers and Idol School. Lee was born in Hoeryong, Korea. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean movie actors Category:South Korean television actors Category:South Korean stage actors
title: Lee Soon-jae
